title: How to get access to the PBE?
body: I understand that you have to sign up and I am sure everyone wants on to test all the new and exciting changes coming. I am currently unemployed and would really value the effort in bug catching/testing. I play league a lot but I would really like to give myself a purpose again. Is there any other way to get into the PBE?

replies.body:
There is no other way to get into PBE outside of applying for access and continuing to play the game. We generally look for players who are really active and are a positive influence on the community. 

You can check out our PBE FAQ [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top). Let me know if you have any questions.
